definition: window/opening providing restricted access (e.g. customer service window)/computer operating system window/fig. medium/intermediary/showpiece/testing ground
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: He bought a platform ticket at the ticket window.
sentences.chinese: 他到售票窗口買了站臺票。

sentences.english: GIFs serve as a window into US celebrity culture.
sentences.chinese: 動圖還成了觀察美國名人文化的窗口。

sentences.english: Mist nudged up against the windows and doors of the house.
sentences.chinese: 薄霧遭遇房屋的窗口和門而用肘輕推。

sentences.english: It provides an optional zoom window for precise shots.
sentences.chinese: 它提供了一個便於精確抓圖的縮放選項窗口。

sentences.english: Resizable Main window and some other cosmetic changes.
sentences.chinese: 可調整大小的主要窗口和其他一些表面的改變。

sentences.english: All projects should have single windows clearence.
sentences.chinese: 所有項目應該只有一個清關窗口。

sentences.english: More specifically, it wraps widgets at the end of the row.
sentences.chinese: 更確切地講，它可使窗口小部件在行尾換行。

sentences.english: A North Korean soldier stared at them from just a few centimeters away, through a window.
sentences.chinese: 一名北韓軍人在幾公分外的窗口另一側注視着他們。

sentences.english: DWL_MSGRESULT Sets the return value of a message processed in the dialog box procedure.
sentences.chinese: 用於對話框窗口，設置消息處理函數的返回值。

sentences.english: The caretakers have to lock her up and feed her through a window.
sentences.chinese: 他們把她反鎖起來而通過窗口喂她飲食。

sentences.english: She pushed me right out the drive-thru window and onto the customer's car.
sentences.chinese: 我直接摔出了窗口摔在了客人的車上。

sentences.english: A dull light shone through the heavy windows.
sentences.chinese: 陰暗的光芒從結實的窗口透出來。

sentences.english: Moreover, it is one of the locations opening to the outside world on the Liaodong Peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 同時，它也是遼東半島對外開放的窗口之一。

sentences.english: Hitting "4" will pop up a sub-window allowing me to select a view.
sentences.chinese: 按一下“4”將彈出一個選擇視圖的子窗口。

sentences.english: Sometimes single-window library-style apps are called shoebox apps.
sentences.chinese: 有時單窗口庫類型應用程序被稱爲鞋盒應用程序。

sentences.english: I like sleeping with windows open at night.
sentences.chinese: 晚上我喜歡開着窗口睏覺。

definition: variant of 櫃檯|柜台[gui4 tai2]
Tongdao Dong autonomous county in Huaihua 懷化|怀化[Huai2 hua4], Hunan
to open/to show (a ticket)/to turn on/to switch on
stage/proscenium/foreground in politics etc (sometimes derog.)/front desk/reception desk/(computing) front-end/foreground
fence/railing/hurdle/column or box (of text or other data)
